meanings.definition: To discharge or excrete waste material from the body.
meanings.sent1: The bird egests waste after eating.
meanings.sent3: The dog egests in the backyard, much to the owner's dismay.
meanings.sent4: The factory egests pollutants into the air.
meanings.sent5: The volcano egests lava violently during an eruption.

meanings.definition: To expel or eject something from a confined space.
meanings.sent1: The magician egests a rabbit from his hat.
meanings.sent2: The popcorn machine egests kernels into the bowl.
meanings.sent3: The clown egests confetti from a tiny box.
meanings.sent4: The spaceship egests fuel before takeoff.
meanings.sent5: The jack-in-the-box egests a surprise with a spring.
